newsitem.title: FRANCE: Danone sees net up six pct for 1996.
newsitem.headline: Danone sees net up six pct for 1996.

text.p: French food group Danone reiterated its forecast for a six percent full-year profit rise on Wednesday.
"The group continues to expect a full-year rise of six percent in net income for 1996," Danone said in a statement detailing its first-half profit, which rose 2.3 percent to 1.73 billion francs.
